RumorFact.Text: A Nomai recording on one of the solar towers on Ash Twin described plans to relocate Ember Twin's solar panels due to issues with its current site.
The Nomai planned to relocate the solar panels on Ember Twin to a grassy plateau on the surface, directly above the Sunless City.

ExploreFact.Text: I found a Nomai recording on this grassy plateau discussing the potential of this relocation site.
The Nomai planned to relocate something here to keep it safe from Ash Twin's shadow depriving them of sunlight and energy.

AltText.Text: The Nomai planned to relocate Ember Twin's solar panels here, to prevent Ash Twin's shadow from depriving them of sunlight and energy during sunless days.

ExploreFact.Text: A solar eclipse is the easiest way to tell when a sunless day is present.
